text: (mema karanavan deka notibune nam), allah ovunva danduvam nokara sitimata kumana (badhavakda?) mandayat ovun nam, ehi araksakayin vasayen nositiyadi (janatava) suddha vu masjidayata ætulu vima valakavannaha. parisuddhavantayin misa, vena kisivekut ehi araksakayin vasayen sitimata nohækiya. ehet ovungen vædi deneku (meya) dæna ganne næta
